description:
We have one controller node and two compute node,in the process of live-migration,nova-conductor dispatch check_can_live_migrate_destination rpc message to nova-compute check_can_live_migrate_destination,when reply of the rpc messsage timeout,
the vlaue of status in migrations tables is not error,but pre-migrating.

the log of conductor:
2016-04-26 19:29:06.272 12178 INFO nova.conductor.tasks.live_migrate [req-67d2fcfe-2542-41b4-adbe-44ed3069b520 08f39fe7f250413c8bafa2937025b86a d3c3ac7e483543e9af1d02560bf6d03d - - -] Skipping host: devcompute1 because: check can live migrate dest error:because: Timed out waiting for a reply to message ID 08637bcd124043b2929400c1189978f3
title: status of migrations table is pre-migrating when live-migration failed

comments.content:
We have one controller node and two compute node,in the process of live-migration,nova-conductor dispatch check_can_live_migrate_destination rpc message to nova-compute check_can_live_migrate_destination,when reply of the rpc messsage timeout,
the vlaue of status in migrations tables is not error,but pre-migrating.

comments.content:
What version of Nova is this reported against? Liberty? Mitaka? Newton (master)?

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/215483/ might be related to helping with this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it,
therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and
set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi
